name: Doctor Mario
text: Hello! What can I help you with today?!

name: Player
text: Hello! I'm not sure...everything feels wrong

name: Doctor Mario
text: Mama mia, don't worry we have a pill for that, try this!

name: Player
text: oh wow! I can hear again! Before when I would walk around, there was no sound

name: Doctor Mario
text: Okay great! Well do you like it? If not there's another pill to cancel that one
